data.lyric:
[ti:mirrorball]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]mirrorball - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.41]Written by：Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:00.82]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Sony/ATV Songs LLC / Ducky Donath Music (BMI)
[00:02.39]All Rights Reserved. Used By Permission.
[00:02.88]Produced by：Jack Antonoff and Taylor Swift
[00:03.46]Recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA) and Jack Antonoff at Rough Customer Studio (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:05.19]Mixed by：Serban Ghenea at Mixstar Studios (Virginia Beach, VA)
[00:06.02]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:06.84]Live Drums, Percussion, Programming, Electric and Acoustic Guitars, Keyboards, B3, Background
[00:07.83]Vocals by：Jack Antonoff at Rough Customer Studio (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:09.15]I want you to know
[00:15.84]
[00:17.01]I'm a mirrorball
[00:21.07]I'll show you every version of yourself tonight
[00:29.76]I'll get you out on the floor
[00:34.06]Shimmering beautiful
[00:38.53]And when I break it's in a million pieces
[00:44.93]Hush
[00:45.98]When no one is around my dear
[00:51.47]You'll find me on my tallest tiptoes
[00:55.73]Spinning in my highest heels love
[00:59.28]Shining just for you
[01:02.41]Hush
[01:03.51]I know they said the end is near
[01:08.84]But I'm still on my tallest tiptoes
[01:13.21]Spinning in my highest heels love
[01:16.71]Shining just for you
[01:19.90]I want you to know
[01:26.79]I'm a mirrorball
[01:30.81]I can change everything about me to fit in
[01:36.23]You are not like the regulars
[01:43.64]The masquerade revelers
[01:48.06]Drunk as they watch my shattered edges glisten
[01:54.72]Hush
[01:55.75]When no one is around my dear
[02:01.15]You'll find me on my tallest tiptoes
[02:05.55]Spinning in my highest heels love
[02:09.09]Shining just for you
[02:12.11]Hush
[02:13.13]I know they said the end is near
[02:18.59]But I'm still on my tallest tiptoes
[02:22.96]Spinning in my highest heels love
[02:26.47]Shining just for you
[02:29.62]And they called off the circus
[02:31.88]Burned the disco down
[02:33.79]When they sent home the horses
[02:35.98]And the rodeo clowns
[02:38.07]I'm still on that tightrope
[02:40.37]I'm still trying everything
[02:43.70]to get you laughing at me
[02:46.97]I'm still a believer
[02:49.09]But I don't know why
[02:51.21]I've never been a natural
[02:53.49]All I do is try try try
[02:55.80]I'm still on that trapeze
[02:57.89]I'm still trying everything
[03:01.18]To keep you looking at me
[03:06.62]Because I'm a mirrorball
[03:11.46]I'm a mirrorball
[03:15.31]I'll show you every version of yourself
[03:20.65]Tonight
data.trans:
[ti:mirrorball]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.41]//
[00:00.82]//
[00:02.39]//
[00:02.88]//
[00:03.46]//
[00:05.19]//
[00:06.02]//
[00:06.84]//
[00:07.83]//
[00:09.15]我希望你知道
[00:15.84]
[00:17.01]我像是个镜面球
[00:21.07]今夜我会如实照出每一面的你
[00:29.76]我会带你去往舞池
[00:34.06]光芒四射的美啊
[00:38.53]在我碎裂的那刻 这美好化作无数碎片
[00:44.93]嘘！
[00:45.98]亲爱的 已无人打扰
[00:51.47]你会发现我奋力踮起脚尖
[00:55.73]脚踩高跟鞋旋转舞蹈 亲爱的 
[00:59.28]只为你绽放璀璨光芒
[01:02.41]嘘！
[01:03.51]我知道人们都在说 即将落幕散场
[01:08.84]而我依然会奋力踮起脚尖
[01:13.21]脚踩高跟鞋旋转舞蹈 亲爱的 
[01:16.71]只为你绽放璀璨光芒
[01:19.90]我希望你知道
[01:26.79]我像是个镜面球
[01:30.81]努力改变自我只为融入这世界
[01:36.23]你与那些等闲常人不同
[01:43.64]那些化装舞会的狂欢者
[01:48.06]如痴如醉的看着我支离破碎的镜面闪耀着光芒
[01:54.72]嘘！
[01:55.75]亲爱的 已无人打扰
[02:01.15]你会发现我奋力踮起脚尖
[02:05.55]脚踩高跟鞋旋转舞蹈 亲爱的 
[02:09.09]只为你绽放璀璨光芒
[02:12.11]嘘！
[02:13.13]我知道人们都在说 即将落幕散场
[02:18.59]而我依然会奋力踮起脚尖
[02:22.96]脚踩高跟鞋旋转舞蹈 亲爱的 
[02:26.47]只为你绽放璀璨光芒
[02:29.62]于是他们取消了马戏团的演出
[02:31.88]焚毁了迪斯科舞厅
[02:33.79]在他们将马儿以及
[02:35.98]马场的小丑们送回家时
[02:38.07]我仍走在那钢丝绳上
[02:40.37]我依然会使出浑身解数
[02:43.70]只为你们能开怀大笑
[02:46.97]我始终坚信
[02:49.09]但我不知为何
[02:51.21]我并非天生如此
[02:53.49]我只是会不懈努力 不懈尝试
[02:55.80]我仍站在那秋千上
[02:57.89]我依然会使出浑身解数
[03:01.18]只为你们能关注于我
[03:06.62]因为我像是个镜面球
[03:11.46]我像是个镜面球
[03:15.31]我会如实照出每一面的你
[03:20.65]今夜
